data.text: @Rachelcella78 @SantaSurfing2 @AntProverbs I love Santa and her fight for truth. May God bless and continue to give her strength. With out her news we would be lost. I think she should have her own show on Fox News. #gosammy

@SantaSurfing2 @AntProverbs Santa, After the election was was stolen, I was very distraught. I asked a friend if she had anything she could send me to give me some hope. I’ve always had hope and faith in God, but for a stolen election. She sent me your podcast. Beginning of my awakening to the brainwashing.
@SantaSurfing2 @AntProverbs So true. Thanks Santa for pointing that out

@IwanyckyjLesley @SantaSurfing2 @AntProverbs I couldn’t agree more Lesley🎯Two years ago when we got locked down from the Scam-Demic I started writing Q music & videos. I was so encouraged from Santa & Sammy I wrote this song for them from my💖I hope it touches yours🙏https://t.co/LkN3qljWiu
@Rachelcella78 @AntProverbs Thank you so much Rachel! Wow….that is incredibly thoughtful of you! 🙏❤️❤️🙏God bless you so much!
@SantaSurfing2 @AntProverbs Yes Our Dreams are comin' True, I saw this pic and thought of you! https://t.co/3qyoIPw8db
